me.croma.ml

Class KMeansClustering

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.croma.ml.KMeansClustering

  • public class KMeansClustering
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide Implementation of K-means algorithm. iterate() is One Iteration of mean adjustment step. iterate(int) N Iteration of mean adjustment step. cost() can be used to get current cost of model.

      Build a KMeans Trainer
